subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Thomas Greiss stopped 23 shots — including all 15 he faced over the final two periods — and the Phoenix Coyotes edged the Pittsburgh Penguins, 3-2, on Tuesday.
snippet: Thomas Greiss stopped 23 shots — including all 15 he faced over the final two periods — and the Phoenix Coyotes edged the Pittsburgh Penguins, 3-2, on Tuesday.
